item.description:
**NOTE: Our December Meetup is moved to a MONDAY.**

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Wow, another wonderful year to wrap up...

A lot of us look forward to this fun event where we eat, pLay and love...Celebrating You and Us!!

Come share "shamelessly" what you HAVE deliberately manifested this year... or in the process of manifesting. We want to CELEBRATE with you.

(1) Please wear comfy clothes that allows you to sit comfortably on the floor. Be ready to move, dance, sing. laugh and simply have fun!

(2) Please come to share at least 1 thing that have helped you stay aligned and inspired in your journey of living a more fulfilled and joyous life in 2009.
(e.g. a poem, an affirmation, a song, guided meditation, book reference)

(3) Bring a favorite MAIN ENTREE to share. We will provide the desserts and refreshments. You're welcome to bring wine too (as an extra to share).

We are very thankful that we have deliberately attracted you wonderful folks into our lives this year.

much JOY!
ChewHoong & Dave

***************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1) Go here: http://lawofattractio...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: CELEBRATE YOU and US!!
